title: How to Bake Maple Square Cookies

steps.headline: Put in a a bowl: 2 1/4 cups of flour (Save 1/4 cup for step 7), 1/2 cup sugar, one teaspoon of fine vanilla essence, one egg, and a little bit of salt.
Cut 200 grams cold butter into small cubes, and add them to the bowl.
Knead into a homogeneous dough.
steps.description: If the dough is sticky, add a little flour.

steps.headline: Flatten 3/4 of the dough in a 30X37cm (Or so) oven pan.
Spread 1/2 cup maple flavored syrup on the dough.
Add to the dough the remaining 1/4 cup flour and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
steps.description: Knead into a hard dough, and crumble it. Spread the crumbling on the maple syrup.

steps.headline: When done, cut quickly into small squares, before it cools down and hardens.

text: Preheat oven to 180 °C (356 °F).  Put in a a bowl: 2 1/4 cups of flour (Save 1/4 cup for step 7), 1/2 cup sugar, one teaspoon of fine vanilla essence, one egg, and a little bit of salt.  Cut 200 grams cold butter into small cubes, and add them to the bowl.  Knead into a homogeneous dough. If the dough is sticky, add a little flour. Flatten 3/4 of the dough in a 30X37cm (Or so) oven pan.  Spread 1/2 cup maple flavored syrup on the dough.  Add to the dough the remaining 1/4 cup flour and 2 tablespoons of sugar. Knead into a hard dough, and crumble it. Spread the crumbling on the maple syrup. Bake for 35 minutes or so.  When done, cut quickly into small squares, before it cools down and hardens.  Finished.
